mapper.insert:
insert into device_position
device_position.device_code,
device_position.device_no,
device_position.direction,
device_position.line_category,
device_position.line_id,
device_position.line_name,
device_position.miles,
device_position.station_id,
device_position.stock_exchange,
device_position.thigh_track_id,
device_position.track_id,
device_position.create_time
values
#{deviceCode},
#{deviceNo},
#{direction},
#{lineCategory},
#{lineId},
#{lineName},
#{miles},
#{stationId},
#{stockExchange},
#{thighTrackId},
#{trackId},
current_timestamp
mapper.update:
update device_position
device_position.device_code = #{DeviceCode},
device_position.device_no = #{DeviceNo},
device_position.direction = #{Direction},
device_position.line_category = #{LineCategory},
device_position.line_id = #{LineId},
device_position.line_name = #{LineName},
device_position.miles = #{Miles},
device_position.station_id = #{StationId},
device_position.stock_exchange = #{StockExchange},
device_position.thigh_track_id = #{ThighTrackId},
device_position.track_id = #{TrackId}
device_position.update_time= current_timestamp
device_position.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select device_position.create_time, device_position.device_code, device_position.device_no, device_position.direction, device_position.id, device_position.line_category, device_position.line_id, device_position.line_name, device_position.miles, device_position.station_id, device_position.stock_exchange, device_position.thigh_track_id, device_position.track_id, device_position.update_time form device_position
device_position.id = #{id}
